scripts.watch:heroku: onchange 'src/*' 'src/*/*' 'src/*/*/*' 'src/*/*/*/*' -v -- haxe build_all.hxml & nodemon bin/heroku/index.js --ignore bin/heroku/_data/ --ignore bin/heroku/private/db/ & livereload bin/heroku -w 1000
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run git:commit && npm run git:push && npm run launch
scripts.git:commit: cd 'bin/heroku' && git add -A . && git commit -a -m 'update heroku'
scripts.push: npm run push:git && npm run push:heroku
scripts.start: npm run build && cd 'bin/heroku' && heroku local web
scripts.start:old: npm run build && open http://localhost:5000 &&  cd 'bin/heroku' && heroku local web
scripts.start:new: npm run build && open http://localhost:5000 && cd 'bin/heroku' && node index.js
scripts._scss2: npm run scss:compilesourcemap -- -w & npm run scss:livereload
scripts._scss3: npm run scss:compilesourcemap && npm run scss:compilesourcemap -- -w & npm run scss:livereload
scripts._scss: npm run scss:compilesourcemap && npm run scss:watch & npm run scss:livereload
scripts.scss: npm run scss:compilesourcemap && npm run scss:compilesourcemap -- -w & npm run scss:livereload
scripts.watch:sass: npm run build:sass && npm run build:sass -- -w
scripts.watch1:sass: npm run build:sass && npm run build:sass -- -w
